abstract: Sheryl Sandberg, the chief operating officer of Facebook, has written a book “to encourage women to aspire to and pursue leadership roles,” Knopf, her publisher, said on Thursday. “Lean In: Women, Work, and the Will to Lead” reflects on Ms. Sandberg’s own personal and professional experiences and discusses the latest research on equality in the workplace. It will be out in March.
